agent.display_value: Microsoft Intune metadata retrieval AI agent

sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: This tool retrieves metadata for all detected applications, including the ID and name of each app. The information is returned as a JSON object and can be used as dynamic input for the 'Look up Managed Devices By Application' action. It also provides execution status (Success/Error) and relevant error messages if any occur. Possible errors include invalid credentials, insufficient permissions, or unexpected issues. A valid Microsoft Intune connection, credentials, and subscription are required for production use. Please refer to the documentation for licensing and setup details
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Look up Application ID
